fullText:
Double Manifestation

Epic Tier
Prerequisite: 21st level, Genasi, Extra Manifestation feat
Benefit: You can manifest two different elements simultaneously (such as Firesoul and Stormsoul). This feat doesn’t grant you any extra elemental manifestations, so you can only manifest elements that you already have access to.

Published in Forgotten Realms Player's Guide, page(s) 139.
name: Double Manifestation
